bibl.title: More on Mummification?: P. Mich. Inv. 3724 Revised.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: CHAPA, Juan

bibl.note: K.A. WORP, Bemerkungen zu Papyri III. <Korr. Tyche>, Tyche 5 (1990) pp. 179-180 concluded that P. Mich. Inv. 3724 (= S.B. XVIII, 13613) 'kann ein mehr offizieller Kondolenzbrief sein'. Discusses to what extent this may be possible or whether the letter is a request for some materials and personal goods, perhaps in relation to some funerary activities. Improves some readings of ed. pr. and casts some light on the context.
bibl.seg: CHAPA Juan, More on Mummification?: P. Mich. Inv. 3724 Revised.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 525-533.
